sys_atf_step_config.html_description:
1. Enter the case number which contains detailed information and use case scenarios of different variable values.
  2. Two output variables will be produced 

                  a. Request Object: This will contain the REQ object for the item.

                  b. Requested Item Object: This will be the RITM object created within the request.
sys_atf_step_config.name: V1.1.0 Create Catalog Request
sys_atf_step_config.template_reminder: Helps in creating service catalog order with input variables and ordering of the cart
